Description: Body sherd (mended from four fragments) of Chian pottery Simple Animal Stylee patterned chalice, with cul and handle roots; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; trace of added white bands; exterior: wall reserved; in handle zone, trace of vertical stroke between bands; brown on handle roots; inscription on wall
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1145) (phase 2)
